email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel available, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s, specifically $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider $49.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I’ve discussed with the owners, and they’re willing to adjust the rate to $50.00 per metric ton, which is their best offer. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $50.00 per metric ton is acceptable. However, could we push the laycan to October 16-21 to better align with our schedule? Also, please confirm the cargo size is 140,000 metric tons. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve confirmed with the owners, and the laycan can be adjusted to October 16-21. The cargo size is indeed 140,000 metric tons. I’ll draft the charter party agreement with the agreed terms: freight rate of $50.00 per metric ton, laycan October 16-21, and demurrage at $25,000 per day. Let me know if there’s anything else to address. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Please proceed with the charter party agreement. Thanks for your help on this. Looking forward to working with you. Cheers, John
